alert.note: Alert for Christian (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 9:02PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CHRISTIAN COUNTY THROUGH 915 PM CDT... At 902 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morrisonville, or 11 miles southwest of Taylorville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Taylorville, Morrisonville, Palmer, and Vanderville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
